item.title: Aix_upgrade_openssh
item.description: aix_upgrade_openssh 1. Download the latest available “OpenSSL or OpenSSH n.n.n” for your AIX version from the following [download link](https://www-01.ibm.com/marketing/iwm/platform/mrs/assets?source=aixbp “title” target="_blank") Register for a user ID at the site if you do not have an account 2. Create directory to hold openssl and openssh. Example: % mkdir /tmp/newopenssl % mkdir /tmp/newopenssh 3. If /etc/ssh exists before the upgrade of OpenSSH or AIX, make a back up of the directory.
